artist: Artist: Gabrielle Bell; Publisher: Gabrielle Bell , San Francisco
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, yellow and ochre floral pattern with title and images color photocopied on wove cover; 28 pp.
inscription: p. 1, black ink pen: Dear Fly; this is the SCARY one! / Do not read it late at night all alone ... Your #1 fan, Gabrielle Bell
medium: Color and black-and-white photocopy; bound volume
title: Book of Black
